name: Tunnel Trouble
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Tap on the left half of the screen to move left to right.

Tap on the right half of the screen to slide down.

The higher you fly, the better the score multiplier.

------------------------------------------------------
TECH SPECS
------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.24.1

Physics engine: Arcade Physics

Lines of code: 386

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code.

Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
